content.question: Which of the following statements most directly expresses the author’s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: “[Napping] seems to be a natural inclination.” (paragraph 4, sentence 2)
“[T]he process of falling asleep in the afternoon is quite different from bedtime sleep.” (paragraph 5, sentence 2)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
